featured.title: E-Commerce Platform
featured.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration. Features include user authentication, shopping cart, order management, and admin dashboard.
featured.longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce platform that handles everything from product catalog to payment processing. Implemented advanced features like inventory management, order tracking, and analytics dashboard for store owners.

featured.title: Clothing Store Website
featured.description: A beautiful weather application with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and personalized weather alerts.
featured.longDescription: Created a comprehensive weather dashboard that provides detailed forecasts, historical data, and severe weather alerts. Features interactive maps and customizable widgets.

other.title: Portfolio Website
other.description: A responsive portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and dark mode support.

other.title: API Rate Limiter
other.description: A Node.js middleware for API rate limiting with Redis backend and configurable limits.
